tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE dresses(dress_id INT PRIMARY KEY, dress_name VARCHAR, dress_size VARCHAR, stock_quantity INT)
CREATE TABLE sizes(size_id INT PRIMARY KEY, size_name VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE dress_sizes(dress_id INT, size_id INT, FOREIGN KEY(dress_id) REFERENCES dresses(dress_id), FOREIGN KEY(size_id) REFERENCES sizes(size_id))
CREATE TABLE orders(order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, dress_id INT, quantity INT, order_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY(dress_id) REFERENCES dresses(dress_id))
CREATE TABLE customers(customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR, address VARCHAR)
